Its user-friendly design allows sales teams to rapidly deploy sales contests, fostering high engagement, successful games, and extensive collaboration. The platform supports the creation of diverse leaderboards, segmentable by sales reps, regions, zones, headquarters, and teams, enabling sales professionals to conveniently monitor their rankings from their mobile devices on-the-go. Proven by Europe’s leading insurance providers, SmartWinnr is effective for engaging agents and managers.
